summary: Adds Iron Patriot as a follower outside Riverwood with a spare set of armor.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a unique follower to Skyrim, based on the Marvel character, James Rhodes, Iron Patriot.

This is for Male Only.

You'll find him outside Riverwood. He will level with the player and is a destruction mage using all three elements and has his own perks.

Furthermore, it adds an second set of armor.

***************************************************
The Armour:
Based around the Nordic Carved retextured with the red, blue and silver scheme of Iron Patriot. It's unenchanted, and can only be crafted under the Nordic Carved section of the Sky Forge, and tempered as usual at the workbench. Stat-wise it's a little stronger than Nordic Carved.
Note the set is standalone, and not a replacer of the Nordic armour. Although it's based on the iconic Iron Patriot suit of Marvel, i've attempted to make it look more armor based, more in keeping with Skyrim. It's about as lore-friendly as you can get.
Ive made made 2 helmets depending what you like, 1 is a heavy dawnguard helmet and the other is the stark helmet.

**************************************************
Compatibility & Troubleshooting
This mod reqiures Dragonborn and Dawnguard DLC's.

The armour should not conflict with anything else.
**************************************************
Credits
Big thanks to Veneraz for providing the meshe for the Stark Hlemet.

**************************************************
Installation:
Simply extract the archive into the Skyrim folder, so the .esp, textures folder, and meshes folder all land into your skyrim/data directory.
Typically:
C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim

C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim
